name: Blade Point
description:
An endless-runner rhythm action game that's about assassination with style.

After exploring the idea for this game in my head for a while, I've decided to implement a sketch version of the basic elements to see if gameplay could be fun and challenging.

The main idea is to have an endless two-button rhythm game, centered around awesome animations taking place as you finish combos.

As mentioned, I'm still exploring what this game could be and would greatly appreciate feedback.

How to play

Press the left or right blades when the different combo boxes reach them.

Sometimes pressing both at once will be required.

When a box followed by a green line appears, hold-press the blade until the strip ends, then release.

Future

Things I'll be working on adding in the following versions:

  • Level ending and transitions
  • Rogue-like rewards for finishing levels (hearts, coins, shop etc..)
  • Progressing difficulty with each new level
  • Tutorial hints
